definitions.definition: Habitual moderation in regard to the indulgence of the natural appetites and passions ; restrained or moderate indulgence.
examples: temperance in the indulgence of joy

definitions.definition: Moderation, and sometimes abstinence , in respect to using intoxicating liquors .
State with regard to heat or cold ; temperature .

main_definition: Habitual moderation in regard to the indulgence of the natural appetites and passions ; restrained or moderate indulgence.
secondary_definitions: Moderation, and sometimes abstinence , in respect to using intoxicating liquors .
( obsolete ) State with regard to heat or cold ; temperature .
